page.title: 11CHAMPNEYS RESORT continued
page.content: Champneys itself combines the beautiful mansion with the most modern and luxurious Spa, symbolising the blend of elegance and excitement which is offered alongside rest and relaxation. Diets are medically supervised, nutritionally balanced and administered by a resident dietician. The basic fitness programme is specifically designed to improve cardio-vascular functions, strengthen and tone muscles and improve suppleness and shape. The Spa with its separate suites for men and women offers a multitude of beneficial cleansing,toning and relaxing treatments. Beauty through health is the key to the Champneys approach.
